getPaint().Description: Returns the Paint object set to the current alpha value.

Parameters: int: The color for fully dimmed. Only the RGB values are used; the alpha channel is ignored.
float: The level of dimming when the View is in its active state. Must be a float value between 0.0 and 1.0.
float: The level of dimming when the View is in its dimmed state. Must be a float value between 0.0 and 1.0.
createColorOverlayDimmer(int, float, flo.Description: Creates a ColorOverlayDimmer for the given color and levels.
createColorOverlayDimmer(int, float, flo.FullName: ColorOverlayDimmer createColorOverlayDimmer (int dimColor, float activeLevel, float dimmedLevel)

needsDraw().Description: Returns whether the dimmer needs to draw.

getAlpha().Description: Returns the alpha value for the dimmer.

Returns: A color with the RGB values adjusted by the alpha of the current dim level.
Parameters: int: The color to apply the dim level to.
applyToColor(int).Description: Change the RGB of the color according to current dim level. Maintains the alpha value of the color.

Parameters: float: A float between 0 (fully dim) and 1 (fully active).
setActiveLevel(float).Description: Sets the active level of the dimmer. Updates the alpha value based on the level.

getAlphaFloat().Description: Returns the float value between 0 and 1 corresponding to alpha between 0 and 255.

ClassDesc: Helper class for assigning a dim color to Paint. It holds the alpha value for the current active level.
